trans-unit.source: Provides schema compilation options for the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> class This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Fornece opções de compilação do esquema para o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> classe esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaCompilationSettings class provides schema compilation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe de XmlSchemaCompilationSettings fornece opções de compilação do esquema para a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations when schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are compiled.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>propriedade especifica que o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>deve procurar violações de atribuição de partículas exclusivas (UPA) quando esquemas no <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>são compiladas.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> deve procurar violações de atribuição de partículas exclusivas (UPA).

trans-unit.source: When the EnableUpaCheck property is set to `false`, validation will be performed based on the following rules.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade EnableUpaCheck está definida como `false`, irá ser efetuada a validação com base nas seguintes regras.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between a strong type and a wildcard, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the strongly typed particle as illustrated in the following schema and Xml examples.
trans-unit.target: Se existir uma escolha entre um tipo seguro e um caráter universal, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>irá escolher a partícula com tipo seguro conforme ilustrado no seguinte esquema e exemplos de Xml.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `A` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>`No Xml seguinte, o `A` elemento será associado `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` no esquema.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between two strongly typed elements, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the first one.
trans-unit.target: Se existir uma escolha entre dois elementos com tipo seguro, o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>recolhem primeiro.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `B` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>`No Xml seguinte, o `B` elemento será associado `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` no esquema.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> deve procurar violações de atribuição de partículas exclusivas (UPA); caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
